few_shots.introduction: Here are some examples of the positions of the bounding box shown in the image.
This is an example: The bounding box is clearly on the left side (not slightly left) of the image.
few_shots.assistant: Yes, it is clearly on the left side.

few_shots.introduction: This is an example: The bounding box is slightly on the left side (not clearly left) of the image.
few_shots.assistant: Yes, it is slightly on the left side.

few_shots.introduction: This is an example: The bounding box is clearly on the right side (not slightly right) of the image.
few_shots.assistant: Yes, it is clearly on the right side.

few_shots.introduction: This is an example: The bounding box is slightly on the right side (not clearly right) of the image.
few_shots.assistant: Yes, it is slightly on the right side.

few_shots.introduction: This is an example: The bounding box is on the central of the image.
few_shots.assistant: Yes, it is on the central side.

image_introduction.introduction: Now, I will give you five screenshots for decision making.
This screenshot is five steps before the current step of the game
This screenshot is three steps before the current step of the game
This screenshot is two steps before the current step of the game
This screenshot is the previous step of the game
This screenshot is the current step of the game
